name: Magic Knight
description:
Play as a Knight, who doesn't wield a sword but uses Magic!

Use arrow keys to move and 'x' to shoot. Press 'Enter' to pause.

Shoot Enemies to get points.

The Goal is get as many points as you can.

This is my first game. Any kind of  feedback and criticism is welcome and encouraged.
